nodes.text: Grave of Ziro Desilijic Tiure's father

Ziro Desilijic Tiure's father was buried in a grave on the planet Teth. It was a secret location in which Ziro hid the Hutt diary, which contained critical information on the Hutt Grand Council. Around 21 BBY, when Ziro came here to retrieve the diary, he was killed by Sy Snootles next to his father's remains.
